alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 8:42PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lincoln County through 930 PM CDT... At 842 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sutherland, or 18 miles west of North Platte, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sutherland, Hershey, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Coker and O`Fallons. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 153 and 168. Highway 83 between mile markers 69 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Nebraska.
